creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: woman kneeling on yellow mat in front of raised object under moon; paddle in raised PR hand; small farmhouse at R with steep, thatched roof; delicate reeds with white, red, and pink blossoms at R
markings: marks: Japanese inscription back R in pen; back R in pencil: (Woman Pounding / Rice? / (landscape)) seals URC: 今康 and 壽; label top center: (Gosho / Moonlight Farm Scene Fall / Color / (Sm.)); sticker on label: 139
title: Woman Pounding Clothes in the Moonlight
